data.subject: Whatever It Takes
data.lyric:
Falling too fast to prepare
 for this
 Tripping in the world
 could be dangerous
 Everybody circling

data.subject: Thunder
data.lyric:
Just a young gun with a quick fuse
 I was uptight wanna let loose
 I was dreaming of bigger things

data.subject: Believer
data.lyric:
First things first
 I'ma say all the words
 inside my head
 I'm fired up
 and tired of the way
 that
